input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

input.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.
input.help_text: You will need to create a file with information about the samples in your experiment before running the pipeline.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

target_reference_information.title: Target reference information

Target_Reference.description: The path to the fasta file containing the target genome (can have multiple segments in the same file).

SnpEff_Name.description: The name of the folder containing the snpEff data (sequence.fasta and genes.gbk).

SnpEff_Folder.description: The path to the folder that contains the snpEff data folders. (i.e. the path to the parent folder of SnpEff_Name)

GenePos.description: (Optional) The path to an Excel file containing some annotations to highlight in the variant graph.

target_reference_information.description: The files and folders describing the target reference to align to.

read_filtering_trimming.title: Read trimming and alignment filtering options.

Read_MinMAPQ.description: The minimum mapping quality for a read to be retained.

snp_consensus.title: Options that control the requirements to report SNPs and call consensus.

Consensus_MinDepth.description: The minimum depth at a position for a consensus to be called. Position below this value will be "N"

Consensus_MinFreq.description: Minimum frequency of a SNP to make consensus.

SNP_MaxCov.description: The maximum depth. Areas above this depth will be downsampled before SNP calling. Areas below this depth will not be affected. Defaults to -1, keeps all reads.

SNP_MinDepth.description: The minimum depth for a SNP to be in the filtered reports.

SNP_MinFreq.description: The minimum frequency of a SNP to be reported in the filtered reports.

pipeline_options.title: Options related to running the pipeline.

SLURM_Queue.description: The name of the SLURM partition to use for jobs.

max_cpus.description: Maximum number of CPUs that can be requested for any single job.
max_cpus.help_text: Use to set an upper-limit for the CPU requirement for each process. Should be an integer e.g. `--max_cpus 1`

max_memory.description: Maximum amount of memory that can be requested for any single job.
max_memory.help_text: Use to set an upper-limit for the memory requirement for each process. Should be a string in the format integer-unit e.g. `--max_memory '8.GB'`

max_time.description: Maximum amount of time that can be requested for any single job.
max_time.help_text: Use to set an upper-limit for the time requirement for each process. Should be a string in the format integer-unit e.g. `--max_time '2.h'`
